snippet.title: Half-Life: Rocket Crowbar - (not full) Playthrough
snippet.description:
I couldn't find the original mod page, so here's the closest thing:
https://www.moddb.com/games/half-life-opposing-force/addons/gold-source-anthology-add-on-content-pack

This is actually a multiplayer mod, and this can be clearly seen by how broken some weapons and features are. It's still fun to play in singleplayer, though.

I decided to start this at the beginning of Residue Processing to not make it drag on for too long. Although, when I finished, I changed my mind and recorded the first half of the game to "seamlessly" put it before the second half, but the file got broken. Oh well.

I know I didn't use some weapons at their full extent or didn't use some at all, like shotgun's beam stacking to create a black hole, or tripmines.

Also, I added game's music in places where it's interruted by loadings. I planned to cut moments where I fail and/or die, but decided to leave them in.
